Description_lang: Transform to demon form for $d, increasing current health by $s2%, healing for that amount, and increasing Armor by $s8%$?s235893[. Versatility increased by $s5%][]$?s321067[. While transformed, Shear and Fracture generate one additional Lesser Soul Fragment][]$?s321068[ and $s4 additional Fury][].
AuraDescription_lang: Maximum health increased by $w2%.Armor increased by $w8%.$?s235893[Versatility increased by $w5%. ][]$?s263642[Fracture][Shear] generates $w4 additional Fury and one additional Lesser Soul Fragment.

description_blz.en_US: Transform to demon form for 15 sec, increasing current health by 40%, healing for that amount, and increasing Armor by 200%.
description_blz.es_MX: Cambia a la forma de demonio durante 15 s, lo que aumenta un 40% la salud actual, te sana esa cantidad y aumenta un 200% la armadura.
description_blz.pt_BR: Assume a forma de demônio por 15 s, aumentando em 40% os pontos de vida atuais, concedendo a mesma quantidade de cura e aumentando em 200% a Armadura.
description_blz.de_DE: Lässt Euch für 15 Sek. in Eure Dämonengestalt übergehen, die Eure aktuelle Gesundheit um 40% erhöht, Euch um diesen Betrag heilt und Eure Rüstung um 200% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Transform to demon form for 15 sec, increasing current health by 40%, healing for that amount, and increasing Armor by 200%.
description_blz.es_ES: Te transformas en demonio durante 15 s, lo que aumenta un 40% tu salud actual, te sana esa misma cantidad y aumenta un 200% tu armadura.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous adoptez votre forme de démon pendant 15 s, ce qui augmente vos points de vie actuels de 40 %, vous rend un montant de points de vie équivalent et augmente votre armure de 200 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Ti trasforma in un demone per 15 s, aumentando la salute attuale del 40%, rigenerandola della medesima quantità e aumentando l'armatura del 200%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вы на 15 сек. принимаете облик демона. Текущий запас здоровья увеличивается на 40%, вы восполняете столько же здоровья, а ваша броня усиливается на 200%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 15초 동안 악마 형상으로 탈태하여 현재 생명력이 40%만큼 증가하고 그만큼 생명력을 회복하며, 방어도 또한 200%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 變形成惡魔形態，持續15秒，使當前生命力提高40%，治療等量的生命力，且護甲值提高200%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 变身为恶魔形态，持续15秒，当前生命值提高40%，为你恢复等量的生命值，并且护甲值提高200%。
